thread.title: CBB's highest paid housemates of all time revealed - including Ray J's huge $1 million salary - Irish Mirror Online
thread.title_full: CBB's highest paid housemates of all time revealed - including Ray J's huge $1 million salary - Irish Mirror Online

author: Lara Martin
title: CBB's highest paid housemates of all time revealed - including Ray J's huge $1 million salary - Irish Mirror Online
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother ends another dramatic series tonight with six housemates battling to be crowned winner. 
Bianca Gascoigne, Coleen Nolan, James Cosmo, Kim Woodburn, Nicola McLean and Jedward will all be hoping to come out as the public's favourite housemate. 
But whatever happens, they will all pocket their hefty pay cheques for competing in the latest run of the Channel 5 show. 
CBB bosses are never afraid to dig deep when it comes to securing their dream housemates, as demonstrated this year with $700,000 reportedly offered to Speidi and a cool $1 million agreed with Ray J. Speidi will be laughing all the way to the bank (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN) Ray J showed his love for the UK while entering the house (Photo: WireImage) 
According to reports, American musician Ray J was earning a huge $1 million (£810,000) to appear which, if true, makes him the highest paid CBB housemate in history. 
According to TMZ , producers have also thrown in $30,000 (£24,000) to cover the musician's travel and hotel costs in the UK. (Though Ray J's manager declined to comment.) 
Meanwhile, former Strictly Come Dancing star James Jordan is thought to have got a six-figure sum to appear. 
Of course, big paydays are nothing new when it comes to CBB , which has shown itself willing to dig deep when it comes to securing its dream housemates. 
As you’d expect, none of the housemates ever actually discuss their salary or confirm the rumours about who is paid what so there’s no word on whether all the reported six-figure deals are actually accurate. 
But a quick search through the archives shows plenty of celebrity housemates linked to eye-watering salaries over the years ranging from Ray J’s record breaking seven-figure sum to a more modest but still amazing £150,000. 
Here’s the rumoured Top 10 salaries for CBB housemates: Ray J - Series 19, 2017 Ray J's raking in the big bucks! (Photo: Copyright unknown) 
The rapper is rumoured to be the highest paid contestant in CBB history. He's famous for being Brandy's brother, dating Whitney Houston, and making that infamous sex tape with then-girlfriend Kim Kardashian. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
